title: The Destiny's Child
subtitle: Overview of the girl bands born in the United States leading to the record-breaking group "The Destiny's Child"
curator: Alessia Valentini, Elisa Nicoli, Benedetta Poli and Riccardo La Forgia
description: Our story aims at providing an overview of the amount of girl bands that have populated the music scene since the very beginning of the last century. Girl bands, especially the ones who have their origins in the United States of America, are many and diverse. This is the reason why, after delineating very briefly the amount of girl bands, the number of members they are (and were) composed of, we decided to focus on a particular girl band whose career is marked by an impressive amount of records and hits. Scroll down to discover who we are talking about.

dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of Girl Bands in the World

dynamic_elements.text: The United States have a long-time tradition of bands, and in particular of those bands which can be defined as all-girl or all-boy bands, a very successful concept in the world of music. Here, we will focus in particular on the amount of girl bands originating in the United States.

dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of Girl Bands from the United States

dynamic_elements.text: Girl Bands find their origins in different historic periods. However, as visible in the chart below, the peak of girl band creation is clearly at the very beginning of the 90s.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?girlband ?a wd:Q641066 . 
     ?girlband wdt:P495 wd:Q30 . 
     ?girlband wdt:P2031 ?date .       
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?girlband rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 100

SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?girlband ?a wd:Q641066 . 
     ?girlband wdt:P495 wd:Q30 . 
     ?girlband wdt:P527 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?girlband rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.text: A particular girlband we decided to analyze is the multi-award winning all-female group The Destiny's Child. Here is a table delineating the details about each member of this group.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Music Genres Performed by The Destiny's Child
dynamic_elements.chart_query: SELECT (?genreLabel as ?label) WHERE { wd:Q153056 wdt:P136 ?genre. ?genre rdfs:label ?genreLabel. FILTER (lang(?genreLabel) = "en"). }

dynamic_elements.text: The Destiny's Child has a very substantial musical discography. Apart from all the collaborations, compilations and tracks. However, this is the amount of studio album they published in the years of their activity, The table contains the main studio albums with the titil

dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of Studio Albums by The Destiny's Child

dynamic_elements.table_title: Album Titles and Years of Publication
dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (?label AS ?album) (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?date) 
WHERE {
     ?album wdt:P31 wd:Q482994 . 
     ?album wdt:P175 wd:Q153056 . 
     ?album wdt:P577 ?date .    
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?album rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?label ?date
ORDER BY ?date
LIMIT 30

dynamic_elements.text: Apart from the many nominations, The Destiny's Child actually received many awards of different types. They were recognized for their songs, their dances, their videos and their performances in general.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Awards Received by the Destiny's Child
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(distinct ?award) as ?count) 
WHERE {
     ?destiny ?a wd:Q153056 . 
     ?destiny wdt:P166 ?award .
          SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?award rdfs:label         ?label.
      }
}

GROUP BY ?label ?count 
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 13

dynamic_elements.table_title: The Destiny's Child at the 47th edition of the Super Bowl in 2013

dynamic_elements.text: To conclude, The Destiny's Child's career consists of many records and unforgettable successful songs. The group, though not active anymore, remains one of the greatest hip-hop girl bands to ever dominate the global scene.
